name: Kit (demo)
description:
“I, Kit Winter, soon to be free of my life, leave this final record of its course.”

A fallen family. A lifetime of inexplicable misfortunes. A parent burying a still living son.

Left to die in an abandoned wine cellar, Kit recounts his tale of woe, and begins his final rites himself...

Only to find he may not be alone here after all.

Kit is a Gothic horror tale currently in development by one very tired artist, Kuyuan. 

The demo features:

  • 4k words
  • Hand drawn illustrations
  • Haunting (hehe) original soundtrack

The full game will feature:

  • Words, a lot of ‘em. 
  • Multiple endings
  • One optional romance
  • And plenty of Poe references

Release: TBA (2023)

Kit is a visual novel with a focus on the Gothic and less on the horror. There are no loud noises or jump scares, but the game does include darker content such as Death, injury, alcohol, depiction of human remains, and technically being buried alive, kinda sorta.

I'm a one person team working on the artwork, writing, programming, music and sound. When I'm not crying. My socials are linked below!

  • Twitter
  • Tumblr
  • Ko-fi
